text: ma yantazir hwla' almeandwn alkafirun baed qiam al'adilat albayinat 'iilaa 'an yatiahum allah eaza wajala ealaa alwajh allayq bih subhanah fi zulal min alsahab yawm alqyamt; lyfsl baynahum bialqada' aleadl, wa'ana tati almlaykt, whynydh yaqdi allah taealaa fihim qda'h. wa'iilayh wahdah tarjie 'umur alkhlayq jmyeha
